line_infantry_squad.name: Line Infantry Squad
line_infantry_squad.description: Those who 'wash-out' of the more advanced units, along with general conscripts from the neon-lit streets of the mega cities, end up in the line infantry squads. They're properlly trained, but their equipment isn't that great, they're not really organized, and their leadership doesn't even bother to try organizing them. Some suspect they're just used as 'meat shields'.

megacity_gang_scum.name: Megacity Penal Squad
megacity_gang_scum.description: The losers of gang-wars get 'shanghaied' off to be in penal infantry squads. They have only the lessons they learned in gang warfare and not much else in the way of training.

eliminators_squad.name: Eliminators Squad
eliminators_squad.description: The cream of the Mega City crop, these men are often heavily experienced veterans of various gang wars, who have enlistened in order to 'finally get some money and respect for being shot at'.

commander.name: Company Commander
commander.description: Foot infantry commander of the imperial defense force.

stormtrooper_commander.name: Stormtrooper Commander
stormtrooper_commander.description: Foot infantry commaner of the elite storm troopers.

platoon_commander.name: Platoon Commander
platoon_commander.description: Foot infantry platoon leader of the imperial defense force.

commissar.name: Commissar
commissar.description: A field officer assigned to keep soldiers motivated and in line.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: A trained psychic to support the fighters.

constript_squad.name: Conscript Squad
constript_squad.description: An inexperienced squad of infantry sent to the front with little training.

infantry_squad.name: Infantry Squad
infantry_squad.description: The backbone of the imperial defense force.

veteran_squad.name: Veteran Infantry Squad
veteran_squad.description: A more experienced infantry squad that has seen combat and survived.

command_squad.name: Command Squad
command_squad.description: A smaller infantry squad used to support a commanding officer.

heavy_weapon_squad.name: Heavy Weapons Squad
heavy_weapon_squad.description: A squad of heavy weapons teams loaded out to deal with a variety of targets.

specialist_squad.name: Specialist Squad
specialist_squad.description: An infantry team kitted out with several special weapons to serve a specific purpose.

sniper_team.name: Sniper Team
sniper_team.description: An infantry squad loaded out to hunt high value targets.

stormtroopers.name: Stormtroopers
stormtroopers.description: Specially equipped and elite trained stormtrooper infantry.

rider_squad.name: Rider Squad
rider_squad.description: A squad of infantry mounted on either horseback or motorcycle for more mobility.

ogres.name: Ogres
ogres.description: A squad of super-strong large human-like creatures.

command_battle_tank.name: Battle Tank Commander
command_battle_tank.description: A main line battle tank commander.

light_apc.name: APC
light_apc.description: A light transport of the imperial defense force.

armored_truck.name: Armored Truck
armored_truck.description: An armored transport of the imperial defense force.

armored_stormtrooper_truck.name: Armored Stormtrooper Truck
armored_stormtrooper_truck.description: An armored transport of the imperial defense force.

assault_vehicle.name: Assault Vehicle
assault_vehicle.description: A light assault vehicle with multiple roles.

support_vehicle.name: Support Vehicle
support_vehicle.description: A support vehicle with multiple roles from artillery to anti-air.

light_gunship.name: Light Transport Gunship
light_gunship.description: A light gunship with sliding doors for troop transport.

heavy_gunship.name: Heavy Gunship
heavy_gunship.description: A heavy gunship with a variety of weapon options.

super_heavy_battle_tank.name: Super Heavy Battle Tank
super_heavy_battle_tank.description: A titanic battle tank with a variety of weapon options.

high_command.name: High Command
high_command.description: This model may use Defense Force Tactics one additional time.

defense_force_tactics.name: Defense Force Tactics
defense_force_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ 
 * +3" of Movement

no_retreat.name: No Retreat
no_retreat.description: Once per round, when a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 3" fails a Courage test, it may remove a model to re-roll that test. The second result must be used.

extra_armor.name: Reinforced Hull
extra_armor.description: Subtract 1 from all Damage Table(X) rolls for this model.

battle_tank_tactics.name: Battle Tank Tactics
battle_tank_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Battle Tank_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * +3" Movement 
 * Impact(+3).

fortify.name: Courage
fortify.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Courage until the end of the round.

storm.name: Strike
storm.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 2 hits each with AP 4.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Save the next time it is attacked.

shroud.name: Shroud
shroud.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets -1 to be hit the next time it is attacked.

bolt.name: Bolt
bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 1 hit with AP 7 and Damage 3.

defensive_tactics.name: Tunnels and Trenches
defensive_tactics.flavor: The people of the megacities are unused to being above ground and not inside massive buildings, and thus spend much of their offhours building complex tunnel networks and trenches
defensive_tactics.description: Use when an Infantry is targetted by an attack. That unit is treated as being in Light Cover, or Hard Cover if already in Light Cover.

bug_dust.name: Alien Roach Dust
bug_dust.flavor: Made from the ground up glands of the foul insectoid aliens, this stimulent is very powerful, and warps the user to hate their enemy.
bug_dust.description: Use when an Infantry is doing a charge or fight action. The unit is treated as having +1 strength, but at the end of the unit's activation, it gets +1 shock.

take_cover.name: Take Cover
take_cover.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ unit. It gets +1 Save.
take_cover.flavor: Imperial Defense force soldiers are trained to take the best advantage of cover they can to survive.

bravery.name: Bravery
bravery.description: Use when activating a unit. That unit gets +1 Courage.
bravery.flavor: These soldiers are particularly brave in the face of many horrors.

field_repairs.name: Field Repairs
field_repairs.description: Use when activating a _Vehicle_ unit. That unit may remove one critical damage.

firing_ports.name: Firing Ports
firing_ports.description: Use when activating an _Infantry_ unit embarked in a Transport. That unit may make a single Shoot action.
firing_ports.flavor: Mechanized forces usually have modified firing ports to allow infantry to fire their weapons while embarked.

rapid_disembark.name: Rapid Disembark
rapid_disembark.description: Use when activating a transport _Vehicle_ unit. At any time during this unit's activation, all embarked units may make a free Move action to disembark. This may be used even after the transport has taken 2 Move actions.
rapid_disembark.flavor: Rapidly disembarking is a difficult feat only for those expertly trained.

well_built.name: Well-Built
well_built.flavor: Expertly built and well-maintained, this vehicle is prepared for battle.
well_built.description: Use when a _Vehicle_ unit is targeted by an attack. For that attack, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 3 or less the hit is ignored.

drilled_marksmen.name: Drilled Marksmen
drilled_marksmen.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit Shoots. That unit gets +1 Accuracy if it did not move this round.
drilled_marksmen.flavor: Expertly drilled, these soldiers can aim and hit targets with considerable accuracy.

focused_attack.name: Focused Attack
focused_attack.description: Use when a unit hits an enemy with a shooting attack. The next unit to shoot at that target gets +1 Accuracy.
focused_attack.flavor: Spotting targets for other units is sometimes left to the infantry but can be quite effective.

ranked_fire.name: Ranked Fire
ranked_fire.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit shoots. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause 2 hits instead of 1.
ranked_fire.flavor: Sometimes infantry units will organize into multiple ranks, firing one after another in a devastating volley.

ambush_tactics.name: Ambush
ambush_tactics.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in Ambush before the game begins. Any round after the first, when this unit is activated while in reserves, you may choose a point on the battlefield 12" away from any enemy units and take an Initiative check. If passed, place the unit at that location on the location. If failed, use D10 scattering to determine the landing location of the unit relative to the chosen point.

superhuman_strength.name: Superhuman Strength
superhuman_strength.flavor: These soldiers have an unnatural ability to smash their targets.
superhuman_strength.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit performs a Fight action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

counter_attack.name: Counter Attack
counter_attack.flavor: Not afraid of a fight, these soldiers will Counter Attack upon their enemies.
counter_attack.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit is targeted by a Fight action. If that unit has not yet activated, it may perform a Counter Attack reaction without testing Initiative.

strategist.name: Brilliant Strategist
strategist.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Brilliant Strategist.
strategist.flavor: This model has an adept strategic mind.

high_command.name: High Command
high_command.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Defense Force Tactics with High Command.
high_command.flavor: This model has been promoted to a higher position in the defense force ranks.

hammer_cannon.name: The Hammer
hammer_cannon.description: Replace one model's Battle Cannon with The Hammer.
hammer_cannon.flavor: A battle cannon with extra deadly force.
